headline: CONY: Cautious Of A Shift In The Crypto Cycle (Rating Downgrade)
summary: CONY's synthetic option strategy exposes investors to full downside risk, especially if Bitcoin's price crashes. Read why I am downgrading CONY ETF to a hold.
